title: Authorizes reassessment of real property based upon substantial change in valuation based on physical, statutory or economic conditions without affecting state aid
summary: Authorizes the reassessment of real property based upon the substantial change in valuation of real property based upon physical, statutory or economic conditions, without affecting the state aid for reassessment; increases state assistance payable from $5 to $15 per parcel.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the real property tax law, in relation to state assistance for local real property tax reassessment
